comments:

Alexander, don't have enough context to try and debug or fix this.  For example, the bug could be in SWT or in the way org.epic.perleditor.editors.PerlEditor makes use of SWT.  I suggest that you reopen this bug against whatever component PerlEditor is and have them look into it.
